subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari is rising, and the Knicks are falling. When the two lines finally intersect, Gallinari will join the starting lineup and begin his N.B.A. career in earnest.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari is rising, and the Knicks are falling. When the two lines finally intersect, Gallinari will join the starting lineup and begin his N.B.A. career in earnest.
